<section class="hero hero--home inverse">

  <div class="container">

    <h1 class="h1">
      <span class="small">The fastest way to</span>
      <span class="small">build the fastest sites</span>
    </h1>

    <p class="hero-description">
      Build, test, and deploy globally with Netlifys all-in-one platform for modern web projects
    </p>
    <footer>
      <ul>
        <li>
          <a class="button" href="https://app.netlify.com/signup" id="cta-hero-getstartedforfree">
            Get started for free
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a class="cta-link" href="/enterprise/contact/" id="cta-hero-talktoanexpert">
            Questions? Talk to an expert
          </a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </footer>
  </div>
  <div class="illo">
    <svg
  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
  viewBox="0 0 4096 690.58"
  aria-hidden="true"
>
  <style>
    .anim-hide { visibility: hidden; }
  </style>
  <defs>
    <path
      id="h-wave"

<section class="section section--home-core">
	<div class="container">
		<h2>
			Deploy your site in seconds<a class="footnote-link" href="#footnote-core">*</a>
		</h2>
		<ol class="grid">
			<li>
				<h3>Connect your repository</h3>
				<svg aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" width="294" height="270" viewBox="0 0 294 270">
  <defs>
    <filter id="svg-grayscale">
      <feColorMatrix type="saturate" values="0"/>
    </filter>
    <symbol id="svg-button" fill="#FFF">
      <rect width="200" height="40" filter="url(#svg-button-shadow)" rx="4"/>
      <rect width="199" height="39" x="1" y="1" stroke="#E1E3E3" rx="4"/>
      <filter id="svg-button-shadow" width="107%" height="135%" x="-4%" y="-13%" filterUnits="objectBoundingBox">
        <feOffset dy="2" in="SourceAlpha" result="shadowOffsetOuter1"/>

				</div>
			</li>
		</ul>
	</div>
</section>

  <p>
    I think <a href="https://twitter.com/Netlify">@netlify</a> might just be the very best SaaS app I have ever had the privilege to use. It is just *amazing*.
  </p>
  <cite>
    <img class="avatar" src="https://cdn.netlify.com/4248a9c81dacb1b192c43f606e6d8af59c571ba4/dfd55/img/v2/avatars/emma-barnes.jpg" alt="" />
    <a href="https://twitter.com/has_many_books/status/967846798986530816" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener">
      Emma Barnes #FBPE
      <small>
        <svg role="img" aria-label="twitter" class="icon" width="16" height="16">
          <use xlink:href="#icon-twitter"/>
        </svg>
        @has_many_books
      </small>
    </a>
  </cite>
</blockquote>


				<blockquote class="card card--tweet">
  <p>
    Just migrated a few SPAs to <a href="https://twitter.com/Netlify">@Netlify</a>. Literally impossible to make the process any easier. Super impressive 
  </p>
  <cite>
    <img class="avatar" src="https://cdn.netlify.com/4707dfb882e7ed9b85e486f29145bec4ac5bb8b0/8f9ef/img/v2/avatars/jared-truscott.jpg" alt="" />

      Jared Truscott
      <small>
        <svg role="img" aria-label="twitter" class="icon" width="16" height="16">
          <use xlink:href="#icon-twitter"/>
        </svg>
        @TruJared
      </small>
    </a>
  </cite>
</blockquote>


				<blockquote class="card card--tweet">
  <p>
    Gotta say, <a href="https://twitter.com/Netlify">@Netlify</a> has gotten really good. Great for hosting PWAs/static sites. So many powerful free features!
  </p>
  <cite>
    <img class="avatar" src="https://cdn.netlify.com/843a4de518aa1ca7a3a2dbfc038aee0bcc9aae0d/9899f/img/v2/avatars/henrik-joreteg.jpg" alt="" />
    <a href="https://twitter.com/HenrikJoreteg/status/908539443237199872" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener">
      Henrik Joreteg
      <small>
        <svg role="img" aria-label="twitter" class="icon" width="16" height="16">
          <use xlink:href="#icon-twitter"/>
        </svg>
        @HenrikJoreteg
      </small>
    </a>
  </cite>
</blockquote>


				<blockquote class="card card--tweet">
  <p>
    I just took <a href="https://twitter.com/Netlify">@Netlify</a> out for the first time and it&rsquo;s nuts: CI/CD, forms, split testing are supported out of the box. Lambda functions are in beta.
  </p>
  <cite>
    <img class="avatar" src="https://cdn.netlify.com/67659fd0046779f334881f04141b95876a76ed49/b8996/img/v2/avatars/steve-kinney.jpg" alt="" />
    <a href="https://twitter.com/stevekinney/status/960610533148975104" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener">

      <small>

      </small>
    </a>
  </cite>
</blockquote>


				<blockquote class="card card--tweet">
  <p>
    just migrated my <a href="https://twitter.com/GoHugoIO">@GoHugoIO</a> blog from github pages to <a href="https://twitter.com/Netlify">@Netlify</a>. Totally hassle free. <a href="https://twitter.com/letsencrypt">@letsencrypt</a> certificate in 1 click. One word: 
  </p>
  <cite>
    <img class="avatar" src="https://cdn.netlify.com/d96fb9e9eafe215fe5a05a56276fd7eae8914e62/b3ba4/img/v2/avatars/alessandro-baffa.jpg" alt="" />
    <a href="https://twitter.com/alebaffa/status/965606177156382720" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener">

</blockquote>


		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="container">
		<h2>Ready to try Netlify?</h2>
		<p>Deploy a site in 30 seconds.</p>
		<footer>
			<p>
				<a href="https://app.netlify.com/signup" class="button" id="cta-bodyLower-getstartedforfree">Get started for free</a>

</section>

    </a>
    <header>
      <h2 class="visuallyhidden">Menu</h2>

      </a>
    </header>

	<h2 class="visuallyhidden">Search</h2>
